physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cellulitis and fluctuance in the anterior right breast; systematic signs of infection, including fever and chills.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's condition improved significantly after intravenous antibiotics and procedural intervention.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cellulitis and axillary fluctuance indicative of a severe infection.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient showed improvement with the initiation of intravenous antibiotics and subsequent surgical intervention.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Erythema of the right breast that recurred multiple times, progressing to swelling and cellulitis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The initial localized erythema progressed to a state requiring hospitalization and invasive treatment.
